parameters: The snow melted on this pot. It got me thinking...
I'm selling snow cones! They cost 1 Quiz Coin.
Thanks for inflating the economy, by the way!
Oh, ah well. Thanks for showing up anyway!
Hey! You already bought one! No dupes!
Oh come on! Now it doesn't have any snow?!?
Nope. Still doesn't taste any good.
I think my hands are dying...
That hamburger knows how to make a good game.
Why isn't the girl in front of me moving?
I hope I get a signature before midnight...
I'm looking at that barricade over there!
Oh! Hey, Touchscreen. I'm doing signings!
Did you know that The Dazzles are sick?
They are?! Oh no! I wonder if there is something
I've got an idea! You can dance instead!
Oooh, so sorry, but no. You'd have to wait
at the end of the line.
I'm not really a dancer, but...
I camped out all night for this spot...
But now I'm too scared to ask...
Who put medicine in a cardboard box
I wish I never liked superheros!
HEY. TOUCHSCREEN PERSON. HOW ARE YOU?
Eh, could be worse. What are you doing?
I HAVE A DAZZLE DAY MINIGAME!
YOU WHACK CARDBOARD CUTOUTS OF THAT
Heya. I keep track of your score in the minigame
that Hamburger Helped over there runs.
You... haven't played it yet. It's fun!
I would, but there's a time limit I'm
Eh, I wouldn't sweat it. Time seems to go
slower when you're having fun. Maybe even to
...I think you've got that backwards, but thanks.
Heya. I keep track of your score in the minigame
that Hamburger Helped over there runs.
Aw, that's too bad. If you got 25,
I would have something cool to give you.
Heya. I keep track of your score in the minigame
that Hamburger Helped over there runs.
Remind me to never go rollerskating
on ice!! I'm about to slip!
...you've been like that the entire time
Well, my skate froze over. I'm stuck.
But eventually I will! And it
I've accepted that this is my life now.
Stuck in snow for the rest of time...
Oh, sorry. I'm watching a banana slug.
These things don't usually come out
Did you know that these are the largest
Or that they could be yellow, green, or
brown? Just like a real banana?
Yes! I knew all of that!
Wow! You're a big slug fan!
I'm lying, in case you couldn't tell.
